extendedInfo.description: Quick searches for your common sites.Enter a search term and choose your target site.  Your browser will be opened with the proper search results on the target site!Some services only work after you're logged in.  After you log in to the target web site go back to Dropsearch and submit your search again.Current search targets include wikipedia, imdb, amazon, urban dictionary, binsearch, about.com, tivo, flickr, ebay, lyrics, facebook, netflix, Barnes and Noble, Etsy, Youtube, Know Your Meme, Dictionary, Wayback Machine and the National Archives..

reviews.comment: Very straight forward, simple to use. Prefer using it vs pulling up web browser on my phone to do searches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, however, hitting the enter key should start the search.

reviews.comment: More useful than bookmarks as it starts the search for you, straight to the results you need. App does what it says.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whoa, cool!
reviews.comment: I really like this app.  Easier to research topics, quickly. Developer  respects privacy, TY for no special permissions req\'d. Recommended.

reviews.comment: Good and compact. But not as extensive as AskDroid, which has a huge selection is search engines.

reviews.comment: Have been using it for wiki, IMDb and amazon. 5 stars. Looking forward to more search targets. Desire.

reviews.comment: Completely different than bookmarks, app works as described. Very useful for me, great application.

reviews.comment: Check out \"Go to url + search\" for an IMHO better execution of this concept. Or look for \"Searchify\" for integration into Android\'s search.
